name: Orbita
description:
Orbita is a game like no other.

A fast paced combination of physics, simulation , puzzle and arcade creates an unique and entertaining game-play that will have you hooked for hours at a time.

This game is all about elegant and precise control. The laws of gravity are at the center of it all. You must use and manipulate gravity in order to get through increasingly more difficult levels.

If you like space, physics and difficult challenges that put all your abilities to the test, this game is for you!

Check out the gameplay video, you have never seen anything like this before!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snT0jo5E7BU&t=5s

Orbita is currently in development.

What you get NOW:

- 24 entertaining and challenging levels
- 3 different game modes per level
- Many hours of unique and intense game-play


What you will get in the future:

- 70+ levels in total
- More unique mechanics and game-play elements
- Challenging variations of certain levels
- Other on-demand features!
- All future features are free if you download now! Once the future updates become live, and you have not downloaded, you will have to pay to get the game.

Visit our homepage and follow Orbita on facebook!

www.orbitagame.com/

www.facebook.com/OrbitaGame/

Note: We do not take any responsibility for keyboards, laptops and any other property that was destroyed in frustration!

Vote the game up on Steam Greenlight so that Orbita can get to Steam ! :) (link below)
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=918201534&tscn=1493892897
